AboutMe.text: Chris Repka is an emerging digital humanities professional skilled in analysis, research, Geographic Information Systems, Adobe Creative Cloud, and Web Design. Chris holds a Bachelor's of Arts in Public History from St. Mary's University and is currently pursuing a Master's of Science in Information Studies at the University of Texas at Austin. His career asperation is to work with libraries and museums to improve the user-experiences and design of digital services.

cards.text: In this project, I created a web-application that linked archival documents to a dataset of over 21,000 resident data points compiled from an 1897 city directory of San Antonio.
